positions.description:
At MediaCT I focused on code quality standards, performance and software architecture.

My main responsibilities included:

- R&D work, creating new products or extensions of existing products
- the development and design of a Data Integration Platform
- supporting co-workers in testing code bases
- enforcing quality standards
- reviewing research documents and pull requests

I provided healthy feedback to my co-workers and employer. I was always open for discussions and tutoring co-workers.
